title: Suppli, Vol. 1
description: The skies are always clearer after a storm... After her boyfriend of seven years dumps her, Minami realizes she's shut out everything else in her life. Now, at twenty-seven years old, ambitious Minami throws herself into her advertising job and experiences lifeâ€"and loveâ€"for the first time. From Mari Okazaki the edgy, provocative author of Sweat & Honey, comes a tale of rediscovering love.
author: Mari Okazaki
